name: SPHERE.IO Donut
description: Create your own webshop in minutes with SPHERE.IO and our template 'sphere-donut'

SPHERE_DONUT_PROJECT.description: The project Key for your SPHERE.IO project.

SPHERE_DONUT_CLIENT_ID.description: The clientId of your SPHERE.IO project.

SPHERE_DONUT_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The clientSecret of your SPHERE.IO project.

PACTAS_PUBLIC_KEY.description: The public key of your Pactas account.

PACTAS_CLIENT_ID.description: The clientId of your Pactas App.

PACTAS_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The clientSecret of your Pactas App.

PACTAS_API_CONTRACTS.description: The API URL at Pactas you want to use for the Contracts endpoint.

PACTAS_API_INVOICES.description: The API URL at Pactas you want to use for the Invoices endpoint.

PACTAS_API_CUSTOMERS.description: The API URL at Pactas you want to use for the Customers endpoint.

PACTAS_AUTH_URL.description: The Auth URL you want to use at Pactas.

APPLICATION_SECRET.description: The secret key is used to secure cryptographics functions. Anyone that can get access to the application secret will be able to generate any session they please, effectively allowing them to log in to your system as any user they please. If you deploy your application to several instances be sure to use the same key.
